name: 棉悠悠

skill.name: 茸茸盾牌
skill.description: 发动后，它会化身为装备在玩家身上的盾牌。将它分派到家畜牧场，它就有机会掉落羊毛。

description: 它只要走在坡道上就肯定会跌倒并滚动起来。而且还会因为眼冒金星而无法动弹，非常容易被当做是猎物，是食物链的底层。

name: 捣蛋猫

skill.name: 跟猫借手手
skill.description: 若捣蛋猫在队伍中，它就会帮忙载运行李，提高玩家的负重上限。

description: 它装出一副威风凛凛的样子，其实胆小软弱。如果被捣蛋猫看不起，某种意义上可谓奇耻大辱。

name: 皮皮鸡

skill.name: 产蛋
skill.description: 分派到家畜牧场时有机会下蛋。

description: Extremely weak and far too delicious. It is one of the weakest Pal alongside Lamball. No matter how many are hunted, they just keep appearing.

name: 翠叶鼠

skill.name: 翠叶鼠出击
skill.description: 发动后会坐在玩家头上，配合玩家攻击用冲锋枪进行追击。

description: Intelligent as a five to sever-year-old human child. It makes a wonderful partner, but there have been more than a few cases where they've killed their master after learning to use weapons.

name: 火绒狐

skill.name: 抱抱火焰
skill.description: 发动后可装备在玩家身上的火焰喷射器。

description: It is unskilled at controlling fire from the moment it is born and tends to choke on the flames it breathes unintentionally. Foxparks sneezes are one of the leading causes of forest fires.

name: 冲浪鸭

skill.name: 乘风破浪
skill.description: 发动后冲浪鸭会乘着浪头冲向敌人。

description: Using its own body water, this Pal can create waves anywhere. It body surfs when in a hurry, but the resulting speed often ends in a fatal collision.

name: 伏特喵

skill.name: 静电
skill.description: 若它在队伍中，雷属性帕鲁的攻击力会有所提升。

description: During the dry season, this Pal is always on the verge of blowing a fuse, Sparks can fly with even the slightest provocation even amongst allies.

name: 新叶猿

skill.name: 猴急步枪
skill.description: 发动后在一定时间内以突击步枪猛力扫射附近敌人。

description: Long ago, this Pal used long objects like tree branches as weapons. After coming into contact with humans, however, it found something much more effective: guns.

name: 燎火鹿

skill.name: 微小火种
skill.description: 若它在队伍中，火属性帕鲁的攻击力会有所提升。

description: Wild Rooby surprisingly never get sick. Eating one piece of charcoal a day, made by burning a branch, is the secret to its eternal health.

name: 企丸丸

skill.name: 企丸丸发射
skill.description: 发动后玩家将装备火箭发射器，可将企丸丸当作炮弹射出，命中目标后企丸丸会爆炸并陷入濒死状态。

description: The feathers of this Pal have all but disappeared, but sadly, its desire to fly has remained as strong as ever. Even now, it tries to fly again in any way it can.

name: 企丸王

skill.name: 勇敢的海之战士
skill.description: 与它并肩作战时，若击倒火属性的帕鲁，就能从该帕鲁身上获得更多掉落道具。

description: Surprisingly, it is unrelated to Pengullet. Ever wanting to be the center of attention, this Pal will strut its stuff for any onlookers.

name: 电棘鼠

skill.name: 电击炸弹
skill.description: 发动后将电棘鼠装备在手上，若将它投向敌人且命中目标，便会引发雷爆。

description: Releases the electricity stored in it's body when under attack, producing a shock that can be over 10 million volts. If thrown, it can even be more lethal than any conventional heavy weaponry.

name: 叶泥泥

skill.name: 樵夫啦啦队
skill.description: 若它在队伍中，玩家采伐时将能造成更多伤害。

description: A strange Pal with a body resembling tree sap. It gradually loses strength if it has nothing to cover its body with, eventually rotting away.

name: 玉藻狐

skill.name: 挖掘指导
skill.description: 将它分派到家畜牧场，有机会从地里挖出道具。

description: The idol of Palpagos Island. If you bully a Vixy, you best be prepared to become enemies with the whole world.

name: 啼卡尔

skill.name: 暗影睿智
skill.description: 若它在队伍中，暗属性帕鲁的攻击力会有所提升。

description: Often lost in thought, it sometimes finds it difficult to sleep. "I think, therefore I am."

name: 壶小象

skill.name: 疗伤之浴
skill.description: 发动后会喷出对伤口极有疗效的神秘之水，可恢复玩家的生命值。

description: Large amounts of water pour from what is thought to be its nose, though some say that it is, in fact, just snot. This  has sparked a fierce debate among Pal scholars.

name: 瞅什魔

skill.name: 摄取咖啡因
skill.description: 发动后瞅什魔会大量饮用能量饮料，在一定时间内大幅提升自己的移动速度。

description: It has few friends because of the perpetually grouchy look on its face, but it is in fact kindhearted. Some have seen it feeding Vixy who have strayed from their pack.

name: 米露菲

skill.name: 蓬松毛毛
skill.description: 若它在队伍中，无属性帕鲁的攻击力会有所提升。将它分派到家畜牧场有机会掉落羊毛。

description: Compared to Lamball, it has finer wool and a temperament more suited for domestication. However, it has historically been kept as a pet. Cuteness is considered a virtue.

name: 寐魔

skill.name: 逐梦者
skill.description: 若它在队伍中，就会出现在玩家身边，它会配合玩家的攻势以魔弹追击。

description: It puts those it is interested in to sleep and shows them an endless stream of happy dreams. Those who fall under its spell are never to wake until death takes them.

name: 草莽猪

skill.name: 坚硬头壳
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上，骑乘期间破坏岩石的效率会提高。

description: Being extremely aggressive Pal, it often picks fights before gauging its opponent's strength. Though small, its powerful charge can even send boulders flying.

name: 露娜蒂

skill.name: 冷娇
skill.description: 与它并肩作战时，它会为玩家的攻击赋予暗属性。

description: If you find Nox hair in your bedding, you should leave it where it lays and leave immediately. Picking it up is a one-way-ticket to a never ending night.

name: 遁地鼠

skill.name: 探测矿石
skill.description: 发动后发出微小的震动，可探测附近的矿石位置。

description: Its large claws boast of diamond-like hardness. However, sharpening these claws consumes most of its energy, leading it to sometimes spending entire days doing nothing else.

name: 勾魂鱿

skill.name: 炸鱿鱼
skill.description: 若它在队伍中，可召唤它来代替滑翔伞。滑翔期间可长时间漂浮在空中。

description: It wraps itself around an enemy's head, sucking out their insides. Pal mummies are occasionally found, but these are in fact Killamari victims.

name: 喵丝特

skill.name: 招财猫
skill.description: 将它分派到家畜牧场，有机会从地里挖出金币。

description: Its hard tail does not deteriorate even when cut off. Some believed these severed tails to be good luck, but for the innumerable Mau who were poached as a result, they were anything but.

name: 鲁米儿

skill.name: 微风滑翔
skill.description:
若它在队伍中，能召唤它来代替滑翔伞。
滑翔期间可长时间迅速移动。

description: Riding the wind, this Pal travels where it pleases. Should it find a partner along the way, the encounter will mark its journey's end.

name: 猎狼

skill.name: 猎狼骑手
skill.description:
可骑在它背上移动。
骑乘期间的移动速度会稍微变快一点。

description: Long ago Direhowl would hunt alongside humans but over the years this bond faded.

name: 炸蛋鸟

skill.name: 炸蛋发射器
skill.description: 发动后化身为装备在玩家身上的发射器，可制造会爆炸的蛋。

description: A frightening Pal that produces exploding eggs. It often fires these eggs from its rear end as a weapon, but when spent the Pal itself explodes.

name: 波娜兔

skill.name: 兔兔助手
skill.description: 若它在队伍中就会出现在玩家身边，它会自动拾取附近道具

description: It prefers places that have an abundance of vegetation, but hay fever has apparently become a problem for Flopie as of late.

name: 波霸牛

skill.name: 产奶
skill.description: 将它分派到家畜牧场，有机会生产牛奶。

description: Milk pours from this Pal like water from an open faucet, regardless of its gender. It's truly a mystery of life, although this mystery may be better left unsolved.

name: 荆棘魔仙

skill.name: 公主的视线
skill.description: 若它在队伍中，草属性帕鲁的攻击会有所提升。

description: This prickly Pal's thorns are highly poisonous. It is friendly with Cinnamoth and only smiles when Cinnamoth is drinking its nectar.

name: 鲨小子

skill.name: 易怒鲨鲨
skill.description: 发动后会以威力极高的水枪，攻击锁定的目标敌人。若它在队伍中，会提升玩家的攻击力。

description:
Long ago, it was a large and powerful aquatic Pal.
As food became scarce it evolved to live on land.
Since walking requires much energy, it gradually became smaller and is now a small and puny Pal.

name: 吊缚灵

skill.name: 空中秋千
skill.description: 若它在队伍中，能召唤它来代替滑翔伞。滑翔期间它会将玩家高高举起。

description:
Its gigantic arms can rip apart even iron.
As a particularly cruel form of execution, serious criminals would be strung up in a public square, and a Hangyu would rip off the skin from their 骨头s.

name: 叶胖达

skill.name: 不良熊猫
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上移动，骑乘期间还能用榴弹发射器连续攻击。

description: A Pal so powerful it's hard to believe. In one experiment, this Pal tore through 3,000 sheets of paper at once! It's only by some miracle that this Pal isn't a meat-eater.

name: 棉花糖

skill.name: 糖果甜心
skill.description: 分派到家畜牧场，可能掉落棉花糖。

description:
Its entire body is 18,000 times sweeter than sugar.
Carnivorous Pals lured by its scent will find themselves overwhelmed by sweetness and even pass out should they take a bite of this Pal.

name: 灌木羊

skill.name: 采摘野莓
skill.description: 分派到家畜牧场，有机会掉落红色莓果。

description: The shrub on this pal's back produces berries as long as it is properly fed. It offers these berries to potential mates, and if the flavor is to their liking, romance blossoms.

name: 美露帕

skill.name: 蓬蓬羊毛
skill.description: 可骑在它背上移动。将它分派到家畜牧场，有机会掉落羊毛。

description: Don't be fooled by its fluffy appearance. A hypersonic kick from one of its long legs may send you flying to the other side of the world.

name: 紫霞鹿

skill.name: 森林守护者
skill.description: 可骑在它背上移动。骑乘期间可以二段跳。破坏树木的效率也会提高。

description: The one who possesses the most impressive antlers becomes the leader of the herd. If their antlers are broken, they become depressed and leave the herd never to be seen again.

name: 疾风隼

skill.name: 旅伴
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上在空中飞行。

description:
It carries newborn Pals to its nest and raises them as a surrogate parent. 
Once the baby Pal has fattened up, it hunts them.

name: 姬小兔

skill.name: 巧手
skill.description: 若它在队伍中，无属性帕鲁的攻击力会有所提升。若它在据点里，武器制作台工作的效率会有所提升。

description: A Pal who's never without a bright smile. Occasionally, it gets its tentacles tied up in knots by Cattiva's pranks. During those moments, its expression changes into something altogether demonic.

name: 炎魔羊

skill.name: 焰爪猎人
skill.description: 发动后会以威力极高的狱火爪攻击锁定的目标敌人。

description:
In the dark of night, this Pal snatches prey to bring back ot its territory.
What happens to those poor souls afterwards isn't too hard to imagine.

name: 幻悦蝶

skill.name: 神秘鳞粉
skill.description: 发动后，会以毒雾攻击锁定的敌人

description:
Sniffing its scales produces a feeling of unparalleled euphoria.
There was some effort to further regulate this byproduct, but the Free Pal Alliance have vehemently opposed these measures, putting a stop to them.

name: 炽焰牛

skill.name: 温暖之躯
skill.description: 可骑在它背上移动。骑乘期间不会感受到寒意。

description:
In ancient times, carnivorous Pals pursued them relentlessly.
The Arsox's irrational rage transformed into a raging inferno, which has been passed on to this day.

name: 趴趴鲶

skill.name: 改善土质
skill.description: 若它在队伍中，地属性帕鲁的攻击力会有所提升。

description:
When too relaxed, its reaction time drastically declines.
Even if it were sliced from head to tail, it probably wouldn't even realize that it should be dead until the next morning.

name: 黑鸦隐士

skill.name: 幻影突袭
skill.description: 发动后会以威力极高的幻影突袭，攻击锁定的目标敌人。

description: Long ago it freely soared the skies. After losing a contest with Galeclaw, it abandoned the skies and now lives a quiet nocturnal life.

name: 朋克蜥

skill.name: 第六感
skill.description: 发动后能探测附近的地下城位置。

description: A Pal that always takes great care to maintain a stylish stance. Always on the hunt for the coolest poses, if given a mirror it will spend all day posing in front of it.

name: 月镰魔

skill.name: 闪亮利爪
skill.description: 发动后会以威力极高的飞跃爪击，攻击锁定的目标敌人。

description: The horns on its head grow under the moonlight. It doesn't hate the sun, but its horns itch when sunlight hits them.

name: 天擒鸟

skill.name: 天擒鸟滑翔
skill.description: 若它在队伍中，能召唤它来代替滑翔伞，滑翔期间右手会空出来，因此可以持枪射击。

description:
A Pal that can easily take flight even while grasping a human.
 It is, however, prone to letting go when tired, which has led to the sudden demise of more than a few souls.

name: 羽箭射手

skill.name: 鹰眼
skill.description: 与它并肩作战时，玩家将能对敌方弱点部位造成更多伤害。

description: A pal that is very similar to humans who hunt and live in the forests. It may prove to be a key for understanding what Pals are and how they diverged from humans so long ago.

name: 铁拳猿

skill.name: 火力全开
skill.description: 发动后解放野性之力，在一定时间内提升铁拳猿的攻击力。

description: It beats the ground rhythmically to communicate with its comrades. The meaning of each rhythm differs by troop, but the distinction between them is still largely unknown.

name: 骑士蜂

skill.name: 工蜂
skill.description: 将它分派到家畜牧场，有机会掉落蜂蜜。若它在队伍中，女皇蜂的属性会有所提升。

description:
A servant that pledges loyalty to Elizabee.
Any that cause harm to the queen are immediately expelled from the hive.
It will gladly give its life to protect its queen.

name: 女王蜂

skill.name: 女王蜂的统帅
skill.description: 与它并肩作战时，在队伍中的骑士蜂数量越多，它的属性就能提升越多。

description:
A chosen queen to rule over Beegardes.
There is a never ending stream of servants willing to work themselves to death for the pleasure of serving their queen.

name: 笑靥猫

skill.name: 丰润之躯
skill.description: 可骑在他的背上移动，骑乘期间的无属性攻击将得到强化。

description:
Grintale's eyes light up the moment anyone enters its territory.
This is no figure of speech-its eyes literally light up.

name: 毛掸儿

skill.name: 毛茸茸茸茸
skill.description: 若它在队伍中，毛老爹的属性会有所提升。

description:
Crawling along the ground, it eats microscopic organic matter.
After a while, it discharges any substances that provide no nutrition.
By using it as a mop for cleaning, everyone wins!

name: 毛老爹

skill.name: 毛茸茸之王
skill.description: 可骑在它背上移动，与它并肩作战时，队伍中的毛撢儿数量越多，它的属性就能提升越多。

description:
While hibernating, a large number of Swee hide within its voluminous body hair.
The most ever recorded is 101.

name: 疾旋鼬

skill.name: 扭扭鼬鼬
skill.description: 可骑在它背上移动，骑乘期间它会为玩家的攻击赋予龙属性。

description:
It can curl up its body and roll around at extremely high speeds.
Long ago, people would tie bags of milk to domesticated Chillet as they grazed to produce butter using this spinning force.

name: 雷角马

skill.name: 疾风迅雷
skill.description: 可骑在它背上移动，骑乘期间会为玩家的攻击赋予雷属性。

description:
It used to be considered an emissary of the Thunder God, and thus was not hunted by people.
However, after witnesses osberved one die from a lightning strike, its reverence faded, and it quite literally fell into the role of a workhorse.

name: 吹雪狐

skill.name: 极光的指引
skill.description: 若它在队伍中，冰属性帕鲁的攻击力会有所提升。

description: On nights when the aurora is visible, it looks up towards the sky and begins to howl a beautiful song. This does, however, leave it vulnerable to attacks from enemies.

name: 火麒麟

skill.name: 赤兔马
skill.description: 可骑在它背上移动，骑乘期间会为玩家的攻击赋予火属性。

description:
It's entire body has evolved into a highly efficient radiator, gifting it with astounding stamina.
When someone has mounted it, this Pal takes caution not to burn them.

name: 严冬鹿

skill.name: 冰凉之躯
skill.description: 可骑在它背上移动，骑乘期间不会感受到炎热。

description: Its transparent cerulean antlers glow with the cold of absolute zero. Any who touch them with their bare hands are instantly frozen over and smashed into pieces.

name: 霹雳犬

skill.name: 跳跃力
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上移动，骑乘期间可以二段跳。

description: At full speed, it could be mistaken for a bolt of lightning. If two Rayhounds collide, the sound is like that of a powerful thunderclap.

name: 苍焰狼

skill.name: 心无杂念
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上移动，骑乘期间不会受到寒冷或炎热的影响。

description: Despite its appearance, Kitsun is extremely sensitive and will flee into a cave when spooked. Long ago, it was considered and ill omen if one were found nearby.

name: 雷鸣童子

skill.name: 雷电姑娘
skill.description: 若它在队伍中，就会出现在玩家身边，它会配合玩家的攻势以落雷追击。

description:
Often kind to lonely pals.
However, the moment a Pal mistakes this for actual companionship, it seizes the opportunity to blast them with a thunderbolt.

name: 秘斯媞雅

skill.name: 反重力
skill.description: 若秘斯媞雅在队伍中，就能通过它的反重力提高玩家的负重上限。

description: It can control those who carelessly stare into its eyes. Those seen with a Lunaris are in its mind, simply under its control.

name: 花冠龙

skill.name: 馥郁花香之龙
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上移动，骑乘期间的草属性攻击将得到强化。

description: A Pal who once angered cannot be pacified. It rages on and on like an inferno. The prahse "step on a Dinossom's tail" has come to mean enraging someone.

name: 滑水蛇

skill.name: 滑滑水蛇
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上移动，骑乘期间在水上移动不会消耗体力。

description:
Its hydrodynamic form is well suited to life in water.
Poachers often catch them and use them in place of surfboards.

name: 噬魂兽

skill.name: 冥界使者
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上移动，骑乘期间会为玩家的攻击赋予暗属性。

description: It relishes the peculiar scent living things give off when they are near death. If a Mariath has taken a liking to you. It is safe to assume that is why.

name: 碎岩龟

skill.name: 钻头粉碎者
skill.description: 发动后会进入甲壳回旋状态，它会一边旋转一边跟随玩家并有效率的破坏矿石。

description: A walking contradiction, possessing the strongest shell and the only drill capable of piercing it. "Digtoise's Fable" is a popular children's tale.

name: 猫蝠怪

skill.name: 超音波感应
skill.description: 发动后就能以超音波探测附近的帕鲁位置。

description:
Often appears out of the blue to flaunt its prized wings in front of other Pals.
Although it seems to be an intimidation tactic, the Pal seems to derive some kind of pleasure from the display.

name: 博爱蜥

skill.name: 爱心吸取
skill.description: 与它并肩作战时，可为玩家及博爱蜥赋予窃取生命效果，此效果可在施加伤害时吸收一部份伤害并回复HP。

description: Seeking a night of love, it is always chasing someone around. At first, it only showed interest in other Pals, but in recent years even humans have become the target of its debauchery.

name: 熔焰娘

skill.name: 熔岩之泪
skill.description: 将它分派到家畜牧场，有机会制造出喷火器官。

description: When it starts crying, this Pal produces magma in place of tears. The magma that pours out is absorbed back into its body, causing it to get hotter and hotter. The more it cries, the stronger it becomes.

name: 烽歌龙

skill.name: 太空袭击者
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上在空中飞行，骑乘期间攻击敌人的弱点部位能造成更多的伤害。

description:
The melodies of a flute made from the exoskeleton of a Vanwyrm are said to cross the whole mountain ranges.
In ages past, such flutes were used to signal an attack.

name: 浪刃武士

skill.name: 紫电一闪
skill.description: 发动后会以威力极高的居合斩攻击锁定的目标敌人。

description: Its body becomes a blade upon death, to be taken up by the next generation. If someone other than a Bushi wields this blade, the soul within torments them until they are driven mad.

name: 迅雷鸟

skill.name: 天雷
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上在空中飞行，骑乘期间它会为玩家的攻击赋予雷属性。

description: Some think it is a related species to Ragnahawk, but there is in fact no connection. Using its sharp beak, it descends on its prey in a quick motion that resembles a bolt of lightning.

name: 燧火鸟

skill.name: 烈焰之翼
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上在空中飞行，骑乘期间它会为玩家的攻击赋予火属性。

description: Some think it is a related species to Beakon, but there is in fact no connection. It mainly eats rocks, and after many long years its beak and head have hardened to accommodate this diet.

name: 暗巫猫

skill.name: 魔导书收藏家
skill.description: 与它并肩作战时，若击倒无属性的帕鲁，就能从该帕鲁身上获得更多掉落道具。

description: With the power of shadows it produces arcane phenomena. It prefers to eat food raw and is particularly hostile towards Wixen

name: 焰巫狐

skill.name: 狐神大人
skill.description: 与它并肩作战时，它会为玩家的攻击赋予火属性。

description: With the power of light, it produces arcane phenomena. It prefers to eat food well-done and is particularly hostile towards Katress.

name: 踏春兔

skill.name: 草原飞速之星
skill.description: 与它并肩作战时，玩家的移动速度会有所提升，且它还会为玩家的攻击赋予草属性。

description: Land that Verdash has run across becomes extremely fertile, with thick vegetation growing there soon after. It will not run anywhere that herbicide has been used.

name: 薇莉塔

skill.name: 大地净化
skill.description: 与它并肩作战时，若击倒地属性的帕鲁，就能从该帕鲁身上获得更多掉落道具。

description:
The castle was filled with the king's favorite flowers. A great battle ensued, and flames approached the castle. Amidst the chaos, the spirit of a flower appeared.
- From the fairy tale, The King's Flower.

name: 绸笠蛾

skill.name: 吐丝者
skill.description: 发动后会以威力极高的钻石星辰攻击锁定的敌人。将它分派到家畜牧场，它就有机会制造出优质布。

description: A Pal that likes the rain,and will often bask in rain showers until the weather clears up. On rainy days, Foxparks can often be found taking shelter beneath it.

name: 精灵龙

skill.name: 善良的圣洁之龙
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上在空中飞行。 与它并肩作战时，若击倒暗属性的帕鲁，就能从该帕鲁身上获得更多掉落道具。

description: It possesses a demeanor as pure as its appearance suggests. Perhaps because of this, it is sometimes unable to discern good from evil, often allowing wrongdoers to take advantage of it.

name: 水灵儿

skill.name: 洒水
skill.description: 若它在队伍中，水属性帕鲁的攻击力会有所提。

description: Its personality changes depending on the quality of the water it was born into. Kelpsea born into polluted waters are generally ill-tempered and quickly become delinquents.

name: 碧海龙

skill.name: 水翔之舞
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上在水上移动，骑乘期间它会为玩家的攻击赋予水属性。

description: This Pal's white ribbon turns black if doused with impure water. Given its usefulness in detecting poison, this Pal was once overhunted. This past has left them bitter towards humanity.

name: 冰棘兽

skill.name: 猎龙者
skill.description: 与它并肩作战时，若击倒龙属性的帕鲁，就能从该帕鲁身上获得更多掉落道具。

description: It can easily climb steep mountains with its hard claws. However, its short legs make it difficult to descend, often leaving it stranded in high places.

name: 狱焰王

skill.name: 狱炎狮子
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上移动。与它并肩作战时，若击倒草属性的帕鲁，就能从该帕鲁身上获得更多掉落道具。

description: While it prefers raw meat, it always ends up eating well-done meat. This is due to its blistering claws, which it uses as its weapon—it simply doesn't realize its prey gets burned to a crisp.

name: 佩克龙

skill.name: 饿饿飞弹
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上移动。骑乘期间它还能用导弹发射器连续攻击。

description:
Contrary to its blasé appearance, it's quite ferocious.
It perceives everything in its sight as prey and will stop at nothing to devour it.

name: 连理龙

skill.name: 超载的爱情
skill.description: 可骑在他的背上移动。若连理龙在队伍中，它就会帮忙载运行李，提高玩家的负重上限。

description:
Its scent drastically changes before and after pairing.
It exudes a pleasing aroma after finding a partner, which is called the "fragrance of first love."

name: 花丽娜

skill.name: 花精灵的祝福
skill.description: 发动后可通过花朵的治愈能力，来恢复玩家的生命值。

description: A pal that transforms into a massive plant when at the end of its life. Once every ten years, a beautiful flower blooms and a new Petallia is born.

name: 熔岩兽

skill.name: 贪食矿石之兽
skill.description: 可骑在他的背上移动，骑乘期间破坏矿石的效率会更高。

description: Magma-like blood runs throughout its body. If a large amount of water is thrown on it, this water rapidly heats, causing an immense vapor explosion.

name: 君王美露帕

skill.name: 大力国王
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上移动，若君王美露帕在队伍中，它就会帮忙载运行李，提高玩家的负重上限。

description:
Melpaca serve this Pal.
Contests between Kingpaca offer up their vassals as a wager. Those seen alone are losers of such contests.

name: 森猛犸

skill.name: 盖亚粉碎者
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上移动，骑乘期间破坏树木和矿石的效率会更高。

description: The vegetation on its back varies between individuals. There is a long history of appreciating this veritable garden of a Pal, and there are even Mammorest pruning specialists.

name: 白绒雪怪

skill.name: 雪山巨人
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上移动。若白绒雪怪在队伍中，它就会帮忙载运行李，提高玩家的负重上限。

description: Researchers once tried to shave off its hair to reveal its true form. In the end, only hair was left, as if that was all there was to begin with.

name: 铠格力斯

skill.name: 坚硬盔甲
skill.description: 与它并肩作战时，玩家的防御力会有所提升，且可减轻火属性的伤害。

description:
The ultra-hard armor surrounding its body is extremely strong and heat resistant.
Even a napalm blast would hardly leave a scratch.

name: 云海鹿

skill.name: 风云
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上移动，骑乘期间可以进行二段跳。

description: In ancient times, it was a familiar subject for painting because of its beautiful and majestic appearance. Fenglope is an endangered species, the "Fenglope" whose beautiful fur and horns are much sought after by poachers!

name: 夜幕魔蝠

skill.name: 窃取生命
skill.description: 与它并肩作战时，可为玩家及夜幕魔蝠赋予窃取生命效果，此效果可在施加伤害时吸收一部份伤害并回覆HP。

description: Attacking from the shadows, this Pal traps its prey within its cloak-like wings. It's probably best not to know what happens within them, or why the inside of its wings are stained red.

name: 天羽龙

skill.name: 天空龙的慈爱
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上在空中飞行，骑乘期间的龙属性攻击将得到强化。

description: Sleeping while cuddling a Quivern is said to be a heavenly experience, but there are some who have been crushed and sent to heaven by ones that toss and turn in their sleep.

name: 焰煌

skill.name: 熔岩凯撒
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上移动，骑乘期间的火属性攻击将得到强化。

description: This Pal is under investigation.

name: 雷冥鸟

skill.name: 冥府之翼
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上在空中飞行，骑乘期间它会为玩家的攻击赋予暗属性。

description: it calls forth lightning from the depths of hell. one who dies from helzephyr's inferno is sure to be sent to the underworld

name: 魔渊龙

skill.name: 黑铠之龙
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上在空中飞行，骑乘期间能对矿石造成更大的破坏。

description: A savage beast born of the abyss. Thou shall not stand before the beast. Thou shall not heed the beast.

name: 冥铠蝎

skill.name: 钢铁之蝎
skill.description: 与它并肩作战时，玩家的防御力会有所提升。若击倒雷属性的帕鲁，就能从该帕鲁身上获得更多掉落道具。

description: Being made of pure energy, its insides are completely hollow. This Pal crams still-living prey into its hollow body, where it absorbs them. Hellish screams of pain can often be heard coming from inside this Pal.

name: 阿努比斯

skill.name: 沙漠守护神
skill.description: 与它并肩作战时，它会为玩家的攻击赋予地属性。战斗时偶尔会以高速移步回避攻击。

description: Once seen as a symbol of nobility, and an idol for those who shunned wealth and power. Yet over time, this Pal became a token of death.

name: 覆海龙

skill.name: 呼唤风暴的深海龙
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上在水中移动，骑乘期间在水上移动不会消耗体力。

description: Legends says the Jormuntide was once a wise man, who after being wrongly convicted and cast into a whirlpool, returned as this Pal to destroy those who wronged him.

name: 朱雀

skill.name: 炎之翼
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上在空中飞行，骑乘期间的火属性攻击将得到强化。

description: It was once believed to usher in the dry season. Whenever there was a drought in the previous year, people would relentlessly seek to cull it's numbers, hoping to bring a plentiful harvest in the next year.

name: 暴电熊

skill.name: 黄色重型战车
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上移动，骑乘期间它还能用机关枪连续攻击。

description: With a friendly smile and a hardy physique, it is docile towards one it recognizes as a partner. For reasons unexplained, its personality undergoes a drastic change when wielding a minigun.

name: 百合女王

skill.name: 丰饶女神
skill.description: 发动后便能通过女王的疗愈能力，为玩家大量恢复生命值。

description:
A docile Pal full of love.
It watches over small Pals who have lost their parents. It uses a full-power Solar Blast to discipline naughty Pals.

name: 荷鲁斯

skill.name: 灼热捕食者
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上在空中飞行，与它并肩作战时，若击倒冰属性的帕鲁，就能从该帕鲁身上获得更多掉落道具。

description: When it finds its prey it unleashes a whirlwind of flames, burning the entire area to ash. Faleris breath is known for its pleasing scent.

name: 波鲁杰克斯

skill.name: 凶猛的迅雷龙
skill.description: 与它并肩作战时，若击倒冰属性的帕鲁，就能从该帕鲁身上获得更多掉落道具。

description: This Pal is under investigation.

name: 异构格里芬

skill.name: 基因改造
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上在空中飞行，骑乘期间的暗属性攻击将得到强化。

description:
Forbidden existence born of madness.
As he lost his genetic relationship with the other Pals, he may no longer be considered one of them.

name: 圣光骑士

skill.name: 天翔圣骑士
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上移动，骑乘期间可以进行三段跳。

description:
In the past, he and Necromus were a single species.
They say that they are an existence that has freed themselves from all negative feelings, but the depths of their eyes harbor traces of resentment.

name: 混沌骑士

skill.name: 深渊黑骑士
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上移动，骑乘期间可以进行二段跳。

description:
Once he and Paladius were a single species.
They say it is the manifestation of negative feelings, but the depths of their eyes contain traces of compassion.

name: 唤冬兽

skill.name: 冰天马
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上在空中飞行，骑乘期间玩家的攻击会转变为冰属性，冰属性的攻击会得到强化。

description: Guardian deity of Palpagos Island, known as the Winter Caller. In the past, when a calamity struck the land, it soared into the sky and sealed away the threat by casting the island into an eternal winter.

name: 空涡龙

skill.name: 地毯式轰炸
skill.description: 可骑在它的背上在空中飞行，骑乘期间玩家的攻击会转变为暗属性，暗属性的攻击会得到强化。

description:
Look over the island of Palpagos from the ends of the sky.
When the calamity awakens again, splitting the earth and setting the heavens on fire, he will destroy it with a glare of complete obliteration.
